params.consumer: The address of the consumer contract.
params.subId: The subscription ID to add the consumer to.

params.to: The address to receive the LINK refund.

addConsumer(uint256,address).notice: Add a consumer contract to a VRF subscription.

cancelSubscription(uint256,address).notice: Cancel a VRF subscription and refund remaining LINK.

getSubscription(uint256).notice: Get subscription details including balance and consumers.
